text: Sojitra assembly constituency () is one of the 182 assembly constituencies of Gujarat. It is located in Anand district. ==List of segments== This assembly seat represents the following segments # Sojitra Taluka # Tarapur Taluka # Petlad Taluka (Part) Villages – Silvai, Amod, Shekhadi, Pandoli, Nar, Sansej, Ramodadi, Manpura, Manej, Khadana, Kaniya, Danteli, Bhurakui, Sundara, Dhairyapura, Vadadala, Dharmaj ==Total number of voters== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Election !! Polling Stations !! Male Voters !! Female Voters !! Others !! Total Voters |- | 2014 || 197|| 98062 || 88625 || 1 || 186688 |} ==Member of Legislative Assembly== *2007 - Rohit Ambalal Ashabhai, Bharatiya Janata Party *2012 - Punambhai Madhabhai Parmar, Indian National Congress *21017 - Punambhai Madhbhai Parmar,Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2012=== ==See also== * List of constituencies of Gujarat Legislative Assembly * Gujarat Legislative Assembly ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Gujarat Category:Anand district
title: Sojitra (Vidhan Sabha constituency)
